I downloaded it and it works fine up till the car chase scene. When it goes to the cutscene at the end of the chase, the screen goes black, but i can still hear everything, but i can't do anything. Any suggestions on what to do?

Ok, macascfl, you have to go to the program files folder, go to mass effect 2, open the file folder called levels, and go to the levels folder, then pick "Chase Scene" and open the .dfr file in notepad.  Once there, change the value of the line
"screen black" from 0 to 1.

That should work

Ok, macascfl, this is what you have to do.  You have to go to the mass effect 2 folder, then open the folder called levels, then open the folder car chase, then go to the file called carchase.der in notepad, and edit the line called 
"blackscreen" and make it a 0 instead of a 1.
That should work

Ok, macascfl, this is what you have to do.  You have to go to the mass effect 2 folder, then open the folder called levels, then open the folder car chase, then go to the file called carchase.der in notepad, and edit the line called 
"blackscreen" and make it a 0 instead of a 1.
That should work

Ok so guys I figured out how to fix both the Lair Of The Shadow Broker (car chase black screen) and The Overlord (Hammerhead crash). 

This worked for me so give it a try. 

1. I installed Razor1911 release of Mass Effect 2.
2. Installed al DLC's including Lair of the Shadow Broker and Overlord.
3. Updated to version 1.02 (at this time it still gave me black screen and crash using Razor1911 crack)
4. Downloaded Vitality's crack and voila it worked just fine.

Just google (Vty 0315 7z) and it should be pretty easy. Copy crack to directory and overwrite.

Hope it helps.
Enjoy

sorry third post...for those who got a problem...try this

1. turn off feedback and online settings at options
2. install the DLC(works for all DLC until step 3 only)
3. install patch 1.02
4. find a crack then copy paste it to binaries on your installer directory 
5. run the crack to play game

So I have a question. i have all the DLC working except for this one. all the right dlc shows up in my questlog like the armor suits and overlord but there is nothing about LotSB at all. Is that supposed to be right?

@auricon69

I don't think you get any notification of this DLC until it gets activated by doing the Horizon mission and after you've collected, Garrus, Jack, Grunt and Mordin. Apparently you will receive a message from the Illusive man about it.

Also, it doesn't recommend even doing this DLC until you've finished the game anyway... as most of its dialog is consistent with having finished the game. Just FYI.

At least that's what the wiki says... I hope its true. lol
